text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Alright, bring it!! Ready or not, let's go!!

An enthusiastic voice echoed loudly from the pool's direction. 
Quite the scene greeted me when I went to check it out ——

Two groups of excited students stood facing each other, 
with Hishi Amazon and Fuji Kiseki at their fronts……

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Oh, heya! You come for the show too, Trainer? 
We're about to start the monthly Dormitory Pool Battle!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Yea! It's a competition to see which of us 
is gonna be cleaning the pool!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Hahahaha… I wouldn't mind us cleaning 
it together every once in a while though.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: No way! We're having a battle, loser cleans!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but don't get me wrong. It's hard work, for sure, 
but it's not like I don't like cleaning.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Anyway, as the Miho dorm's RA, I ain't losing to the Ritto one!!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Wooooh. You go, Amazon, ma'am! She's winning for sure! Get your mops ready, Ritto kids!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Heheheheh, I've never known you to think differently, Amazon.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Ah well… I wouldn't want to dampen the excitement 
of all these lovely little ponies.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I'll have to put my pride as Ritto RA on the line!

text_block_list.name: Rittou Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Aaaaaah!! You're so cool, Miss Fuji!! Beat some sense into those Miho clowns!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Heck yeah, let's get to picking a theme!!

At those words, one of the students walked up to Hishi Amazon 
with what looked like five slips of paper in her hand.
It looks like they decide the theme for these battles by drawing lots. Hishi Amazon went for one ——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Wha!? A K-Knowledge Quiz?!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Oh nooo! Dang… Ma'am's worst nightmare of a theme…!

text_block_list.name: Rittou Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Lucky♪ Miss Fuji's smart on top of everything else! 
Miho don't stand a chance… this battle's over already!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Gaaaaaah…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: No…… it ain't over till it's over! We got a chance!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Running from a showdown ain't my style!! 
Let's gooo, Fuji!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Ahahahahah, I knew you'd say that! 
Let's get started then!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Alrighty, girls! I'll be in charge of the questions since I'm not 
affiliated with either dormitory! My name's Maruzensky～♪

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Thank you for helping out, Miss Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's no biggie. These are fun for me too♪ 
Let's get right into the first question!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
When too many people are giving orders and leading 
the situation to chaos, one can use the following pro—

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I know!! Ding-ding-ding-ding!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh, a speedy response from Amazon! 
Let's hear your answer♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Heh…… In short, you wouldn't know who to follow, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So… everyone just gotta follow me!! I'll take care of them all!! 
That's my answer!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ahahah! I love that you're very much being yourself, but… bzzzt, that's the wrong answer～

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hrm. The answer is "Too many cooks spoil the soup", isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Correct you are～! That's one point to Fuji♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Wha…… friiick!! Bring on the next question!!

Hishi Amazon rushed her responses to be first 
but kept giving the wrong answers, and the points gap 
to Fuji Kiseki widened with every question.
Although, eventually ——

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
This is the last question～! 
"Many drops make a shower" ——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Oh heck yeah—!! I know this! Ding-ding-ding!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: That one's "Even dust becomes a mountain if piled together"!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Woah……!?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh my! Ping-ping-ping! That's the right answeeer～!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Just to complete the question; it was "Give the equivalent 
Japanese proverb"～♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Haahahaha, see that?! I happen to have a bit of a knack for English! Besides, I heard that proverb just recently when ——

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
That's the one I taught you when I helped you 
study for the supplementary exam, isn't it? 
I'm glad you remember it so well, Amazon♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ahh, shush! It's correct and that's what matters!!

In the end however, it was the only question Hishi Amazon 
got right. The quiz ended with an overwhelming victory for 
Fuji Kiseki and the Ritto dorm she's responsible for……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Daaarn, I lost! Sorry, everyone! 
I let you all down……

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: No, ma'am! That's not true!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
I was so moved by the way you tackled such an unfavorable 
situation and never gave up the fight……!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Really…? Heheh, you know how to bring 
a smile to my face, don'tcha!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Alright, a loss is a loss, let's go clean the pool with honor!! 
I'll take the lead on brushing, so follow me!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
And next time I'll make sure to beat Fuji!! 
Look forward to my revenge!!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dormitory Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: (clap, clap, clap, clap, clap!!)
choice_data_list: (I'm liking the cut of this horsegirl's jib…!)

text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon had made a lasting impression on me with 
the way she stood up to any situation……
